(This course will only meet synchronously Mondays from 2:40pm to 3:55pm. The other course content will be delivered asynchronously.)
(Complete Topic:  Shakespeare in Text and Performance)
(This course will examine Shakespeare's plays on page and stage.  We will be watching performances and talking with actors and directors, when possible. We will also take advantage of the wide range of fascinating podcasts devoted to Shakespearean topics. Regular writing assignments and active involvement in class discussions will be required.  You will be able to use any copies of Shakespeare's texts (library encouraged), so long as they are in Shakespeare's language and include Act, Scene, and Line numbers.)
course_description: Selected major plays from the histories, comedies, tragedies, and romances. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
